alert.note: Alert for Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 1:20PM CST until further notice by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Georgetown affecting White, Prairie and Woodruff Counties. White River At Des Arc affecting Prairie County. White River At Augusta affecting White and Woodruff Counties. White River At Clarendon affecting Monroe and Arkansas Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River At Des Arc. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Many acres of farmland flooded within the levees. Water is backing up Bayou Des Arc and Cypress Bayou. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 25.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue a slow fall to near 25.5 feet by Thursday. However additional rainfall is in the forecast by the end of the week, so please continue to monitor latest forecasts for updates. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 12 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Crest Time Date White River Des Arc 24.0 25.7 Mon 12 PM 25.7 25.6 25.5 Falling &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
